DOC.criteria: Subjects receive ezetimibe 10 mg Subjects demonstrate compliance ezetimibe evidence following Proportions Days Covered pattern ( represent PDC 75 % ) : 90 day prescription : Filled ezetimibe prescription within previous 4 month 60 day prescription : Filled ezetimibe prescription within previous 2.5 month 30 day prescription : Filled ezetimibe prescription within previous 1.5 month Patients willing able provide sign informed consent Patients receive ezetimibe Patients receive ezetimibe 5 milligrams Patients history titrate ezetimibe 5 10 mg.
